item.title: Benchmarking Go Platforms for Image Processing
item.description: In a previous post, I performed a bunch of benchmarking on .Net Core for different platforms. Since Go is all the rage these days and I haven’t had the pleasure of testing it out yet, I decided to extend this benchmarking to an Api built with Go 1.14. Benchmarks The test setup is exactly the same, a Macbook Pro dual booting Windows and MacOS with both OS’s running docker. For this benchmark, the Go Api is designed to match the .
